com.ansca.corona

Interface CoronaActivity.OnRequestPermissionsResultHandler

  • Enclosing class:
    CoronaActivity

    public static interface CoronaActivity.OnRequestPermissionsResultHandler
    Handler that is invoked by the CoronaActivity when a result has been received from the request permission dialog. Only used in Android 6.0 and above.

    This handler is assigned to the CoronaActivity via its registerRequestPermissionsResultHandler() method, which returns a unique request code for you to use when calling which returns a unique request code for you to use when calling requestPermissions().

    Added in daily build 2016.2828.

    See Also:
    CoronaActivity

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onHandleRequestPermissionsResult(CoronaActivity activity, int requestCode, String[] permissions, int[] grantResults)
      Called when returning from the request permission dialog.

    • Method Detail

      • onHandleRequestPermissionsResult

        void onHandleRequestPermissionsResult(CoronaActivity activity,
                                    int requestCode,
                                    String[] permissions,
                                    int[] grantResults)
        Called when returning from the request permission dialog.
        Parameters:
        activity - The CoronaActivity that is receiving the result.
        requestCode - The integer request code originally supplied to requestPermissions(). Allows you to identify which permissions request this came from.
        permissions - The requested permissions. Never null.
        grantResults - The grant results for the corresponding permissions which is either PERMISSION_GRANTED or PERMISSION_DENIED. Never null.
